definition: to restore (sth) to (its) former condition/to recover from illness/recovery
to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
to repeat/to double/to overlap/complex (not simple)/compound/composite/double/diplo-/duplicate/overlapping/to duplicate
variant of 復|复[fu4]/to reply to a letter
Hara (Japanese surname)
former/original/primary/raw/level/cause/source
restored to one's official post/to send sb back to his former post
to restore sth to its original state

sentences.english: Should the raw flesh change and turn white, he must go to the priest.
sentences.chinese: 红肉若复原，又变白了，他就要来见祭司。
这种更改无法被撤消和复原。

sentences.english: The patient did not recuperate as rapidly as the doctor had expected.
sentences.chinese: 这位病人并没有像医生所期望的那样很快就复原。

sentences.english: When pressure is lost, the air pressure inside the cell meeting general cell is restorable .
sentences.chinese: 当压力失去时，细胞内的空气压力会将细胞恢复原状。

sentences.english: Preliminary Performance Comparison between the Replica Model of Zheng-He's Treasure …
sentences.chinese: 郑和宝船复原模型与典型福船及沙船性能之初步比较。

sentences.english: The moments allow self and the body to renew and regenerate.
sentences.chinese: 这时刻会允许真我和身体去复原及再生。

sentences.english: As a result, the undo engine has control over the duration of an undoable action.
sentences.chinese: 因此，复原引擎能控制可复原动作的持续期间。

sentences.english: As a result, the undo engine has control over the duration of an undoable action.
sentences.chinese: 因此，复原引擎能控制可复原动作的持续期间。

sentences.english: To handle an invalid contract must abide by the principle of restitution .
sentences.chinese: 处理无效合同应当遵循恢复原状的原则。

sentences.english: Or if the raw flesh turn again， and be changed unto white， he shall come unto the priest；
sentences.chinese: 红肉若复原，又变白了，他就要来见祭司。

sentences.english: Can the country ever recover from this?
sentences.chinese: 这个国家能从这次事件中复原吗？

sentences.english: The officials freed under the amnesty have been restored to their posts.
sentences.chinese: 大赦中获释的原官员们已官复原职。

sentences.english: The article also presents the new point about…
sentences.chinese: 并对贵州龙的复原图提出了新的见解。

sentences.english: Two weeks later, surgeons carried out the operation to rebuild his face.
sentences.chinese: 两周后，外科医生实施了手术以复原他的面部。

sentences.english: She has been followed for 8 months with satisfactory recovery.
sentences.chinese: 术后追踪复原情形达8个月，获致满意的结果。

sentences.english: After a given length of time the buoy sinks itself and is not recovered.
sentences.chinese: 浮标自身下沉，并且不再恢复原状。
